main.name: Anshul Chaudhary
main.description: Welcome to my website, where innovative software engineering meets cutting-edge data science
main.bio: Hello, I'm Anshul Chaudhary, a passionate and experienced software engineer with a keen interest in data science and machine learning. My journey in the tech industry spans across diverse roles and projects, where I've developed a deep understanding of programming languages, database management, and algorithm design. I thrive on challenges and am constantly seeking new opportunities to apply my skills in optimizing processes, developing innovative solutions, and leading teams towards success. With a commitment to continuous learning and growth, I aim to contribute meaningfully to the tech community and drive forward the boundaries of what's possible with technology.
main.contactmessage: Please fill the details below and I'll contact you ASAP!

resume.skillmessage: As a software engineer with a deep-rooted passion for technology and data science, I have honed a diverse array of skills that enable me to thrive in fast-paced, innovative environments. My expertise, rooted in a blend of programming, Data Base  and Machine learning, drives my approach to solving complex challenges with efficiency and creativity.

education.degree: Master of Science, Software Engineering Systems
education.description: This program encompassed a range of subjects including advanced software engineering principles, design patterns, and data science methodologies, providing the skills necessary to address intricate software systems and data-related tasks.
The program provided a strong foundation in fundamental IT concepts, including algorithmic thinking, database management, and software principles.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Played a key role in a team at JPMorgan Chase & Co. to modernize legacy systems, enhancing high-speed booking processes and leading Python workflow redesign to boost operational efficiency by 80%. Developed a GraphQL API to cut booking execution time by 66%, onboarded and trained four team members, and resolved critical booking system issues, demonstrating expertise as a subject matter expert in two strategic platform tools.

publications.name: Detecting Malware, Malicious URLs and Virus Using Machine Learning and Signature Matching
